job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Government Relations,Architecture & Planning
job.description: Job Title: Machine Learning Engineer Duration: 12+ Months Contract with possible extension Location: 100% remote <Work from home role> NOT OPEN FOR JUNIOR OR ENTRY LEVEL - MORE THAN 8 YEAR'S OF EXPERICNE REQUIRED Key Skills: Development of predictive models and analytics Data cleansing and shaping Break/fix support and retraining of models Advisory during ongoing design efforts of future rollouts Skillset – Python, Jupyter Notebook, XGBoost, SKLearn Would consider contract-to-hire; supporting one particular project, but able to expand role into other client initiatives US-based; Houston local a plus Remote work is acceptable Note: If interested please email me your resume at anil.chamoli@mastechdigital.com or call me at 973-922-1844. Best Regards, Anil Chamoli Lead Recruiter 973-922-1844 Anil.Chamoli@mastechdigital.com www.mastechdigital.com
